title: How to Make and Apply a Honey and Coffee Facial Mask

steps.headline: Crack the egg in a bowl, then add each remaining ingredient.
Use a whisk or fork to combine the ingredients.
steps.description: Combine until the mixture is thick and creamy. This mixture will serve as your mask.

steps.headline: Spread the mask evenly over your face.
steps.description: If necessary, use a headband to keep your hair out of the way. Take care not to get the mask into your eyes or mouth.

steps.headline: Wait 10 minutes.
steps.description: The mask should harden during that time.

steps.headline: Rinse off the mask.
steps.description: For best results, use a warm washcloth and water.
